name: Berry Smoothie
description: Antioxidant-rich mixed berry smoothie. Perfect for starting the day energized.

instructions.instruction: Add fruits to blender. Start with soft fruits (banana), then berries.
instructions.tip: Frozen fruit eliminates need for ice.

instructions.instruction: Add chia seeds and optional honey.
Add ice cubes if using fresh fruit.
Start on low speed, increase to high. Blend 1-2 minutes until smooth.
Check consistency - add more milk if too thick.
Pour into tall glasses and serve immediately.

tips: Berries are among highest antioxidant foods.
Frozen fruit is as nutritious as fresh - and economical.
Add protein powder for breakfast replacement.
Purple color indicates anthocyanins - powerful antioxidants.
Supports heart health and reduces inflammation.
storageInfo: Best fresh. Can refrigerate 24 hours max - shake before drinking.
servingSuggestion: Drink for breakfast, pre-workout, or post-workout.
variations: Acai bowl: Make thick, pour in bowl, top with granola.
Protein boost: Add 1 scoop protein powder.
Green: Add 1 handful spinach - color changes but not taste.
